channel.title: [Router problem] PLEASE HELP!
channel.description:
Alright. When i portforward port 43594, i go to "canyouseeme.org" and test the port. It continuously says "connection refused...Why is this doing this?
Error: I could not see your service on 24.24.85.203 on port (1723) Reason: Connection refused
It wouldnt even work on a pptp port..

item.title: [Router problem] PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @oxygen1 oxygen-_
item.description:
@oxygen1 wrote:

Look…It would have said something like Error: Connection timed out. But for some reason my router is not allowing connections to any portforwards… it says Reason: Connection refused not Reason: Connection timed out…

Read full topic

item.title: [Router problem] PLEASE HELP!
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

you didnt open the ports up right

Read full topic
